text: Anata gata wa tsuma-tachi ni taishite kōhei ni shiyou to shite mo, tōtei dekinaidearou. Anata gata wa (sō) nozonde mo. Hen'ai ni katamuki, tsuma no hitori o aimai ni hanatte oite wa naranai. Anata gataga yūwa shi,-nushi o osoreru nonaraba. Makotoni arrā wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okata, jihibukai okata de ara reru
